Ensnaring Chains.name: Ensnaring Chains
Ensnaring Chains.flavor: You whip your weapon around your foe, leaving an opening for your ally to strike.
Ensnaring Chains.requirement: You must be wielding a flail.
Ensnaring Chains.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. One of your allies adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Grab and Smash.name: Grab and Smash
Grab and Smash.flavor: You lash out with your weapon, drawing a foe closer. Then you snare a second enemy and slam it into the first.
Grab and Smash.requirement: You must be wielding a flail.
Grab and Smash.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a square adjacent to you. If you hit two targets, each of them takes extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Dance of the Flail.name: Dance of the Flail
Dance of the Flail.flavor: You force your enemy to move against its will, allowing a nearby ally to lash out at it.
Dance of the Flail.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you attack with a flail and pull, push, or slide an enemy, one of your allies adjacent to that enemy at any point during the forced movement can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.
